website_summaries.verdict: A versatile design, appealing illumination, and excellent customer care are reasons these solar lights top our list.
pros: Suitable for a wide range of uses around a home's exterior, including patios, decks, fences, walkways, and more
cons: Lights may not shine the advertised 8 hours if they don't get adequate exposure to direct sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lights and a perfect finish to my new decking area. Highly recommended and a lot brighter than I thought they would be. Bright at dusk and dark.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our holiday home where there’s no street lights.Impressive with the amount of light it gives .
customer_reviews.author: shekoofeh mackay

customer_reviews.title: Truly trashy
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have mentioned Poundland and I rate these lower than products not intended to be all that good. The published claims for these are all false and the reason is that cheap plastic parts distort the circuit board so charging is hampered. Charging with the transparent part removed gives a slightly better score but once re-assembled the distortion makes the lights unreliable. Removing the top and pressing off-on can cause them to work but when the 'glass' is put back on they die. These are not water resistant unless wrapped in clingfilm whereas ultra-cheap Poundland garden light sticks usually are for a few months. These lights are trash. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Stephen Hall, Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Lights
customer_reviews.text: I've not always had much luck with solar lighting on Amazon with these little lights are brilliant. I got them for our new chicken run and they do a great job casting a very good light. They seem to last quite a long time even with a dark rainy early spring day. I will deffinitly be getting some more for other areas of the garden.
customer_reviews.author: GOH

customer_reviews.title: Quite bright and haven't broken yet.
customer_reviews.text: Can't give these 5 stars as there is a variation in how well they work. Now if you have them scattered around fair enough. However if you have them on each fence post as I do it's strange that some light up and some last longer than others. At this point I should say they are all in direct sunlight and not in the shade. Anyway I have had them 3 or 4 months now and they still work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Young

customer_reviews.title: Not good lights but seller ace!
customer_reviews.text: They started off fairly well, but they don't shine down to the floor very well even at just 3ft high. Then as the cloudy weather came back they hardly light up at all. I hope amazon don't mind me returning them. :-( UPDATE - the seller contacted me and has offered to replace them for free, but I have already returned them to amazon. The seller has kindly offered me another item as they wanted me to be happy and asked me to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Good qaulity lights
customer_reviews.text: I've had these lights in place on my decking for nearly aweek now and they work perfectly. If you want a security light then these are not the product for you as the light you get from them is very subtle, but if you want a nice warm light to make a feature in the garden or on a building etc then these are A1. My only problem with the lights are the fixing screws that come with the product are very poor qaulity and two of my screws broke on installation. Save yourself time and effort and use better qaulity replacement screws when fixing. But other than that I'm very pleased with the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Definitly water proof and simple to install
customer_reviews.text: Great set of lights. Would of got 5 stars but the screws supplied are too short, they hardley work in the rawplugs also supplied. But as I placed them in the 4 corners of a pergola they are actually screwed into the wood. Very simple to install. After 4 days of using them a minor issue with one which is more of a niggle has started and I have to keep tapping it to work there is something loose, but cannot see any thing loose. we had heavy rain when we had a thunderstorm and for a change these lights did not fill with water.
customer_reviews.author: emmsy9

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: When i recieved my order ,i did as instructed and switched them on left them in full sunlight.inside on my bedroom widow sill.the first night they lit up like blackpool light! They were so clear and bright.second night also, but unfortunately from then they started to dim and one wouldnt light up at all. But, i contacted the seller, who responded very quickly,with apologies and sent me out another set! The first set must of been a different batch, as the second replacement set have been brilliant.bright light and are lit up well into the early hours. Customer service was excellent, and the product excellent value for money. So yes i would certsinly buy this product again .i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good in good sunshine
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these - 2 fitted on posts on each side of the front garden fence. The ones which have the most sunshine work really well and the light level is constantly good. However, the ones on the side which has less amount of direct sunshine are much dimmer than the other. Each do work and combined with a solar light over the garage give good light to back a car onto the drive which is what I wanted them for.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted.....
customer_reviews.text: As the title says. These were good and made a nice amount of light in our back garden along the fence. We attached them to the edge of our fence posts and they were the perfect width. About six weeks ago, one completely died on us, more recently another one has given up. I just went to take a photo to add of the only working one on our fence and now that one isn’t working. At first I thought it could be the shorter days etc. But surely they wouldn’t have died at different times and not work at all, even early in the evening when it’s just got dark.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Let's start of with the bad points: The wall screws supplied are too short so I had to use my own. Never a good start when you get something so basic wrong ! These lights are tiny and I mean tiny. Will they last ? Only time will tell. They look cheaply made to me but we will see. In fairness though they managed to charge on a fairly overcast day . I will update the review in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived prompt, well packaged good instructions which are simple. Seem robust considering the price. Needed these for the gate way just to add a little light. Put them up yesterday in the sunshine and they charged and lasted all night , dark from about 7pm to 6am. The just added sufficient light for me to see around the gateway which would allow me to see if anyone was there and enough for me to feel a bit more secure. They do not give a powerful light but sufficient for the job, and the money paid. Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: mrs g beecham

customer_reviews.title: Great garden lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights have really added the wow factor to our garden. We've got 16 in total all around the fence panels and garage which gives the perfect lighting for sitting out on a summers evening without the need for additional spot lights. They give off enough light to see what you're doing and they look great. We've had nothing but compliments and our neighbours were that impressed, they ordered the same for their garden.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Evans

customer_reviews.title: A year later review
customer_reviews.text: I got these lights about a year ago and they're still going strong! They're not the cheap rubbish you get from poundland and won't rust etc after a month. I haven't had to change the battery in them, the brightness is still as strong, all 4 are still working and look absolutely amazing. Installation is pretty easy, just pop it on a mount or screw! The wind hasn't taken one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence R.

customer_reviews.title: not weather proof outside fence mount light. Lasts very short time - not worth the installation time
customer_reviews.text: poor light output, and not designed to be out in all weathers. Lined these up along top if fence, they worked at first but after a bit of weather they are very dim or not lit at all. Install requires 2 screws into base into fence, the snap cover back on. Cover is difficult to remove and now got to take off fence and throw in bin. Expensive to last only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly bright!
customer_reviews.text: My backyard gets extremely dark at night. Every now and then I hear a noise and when I get up to check I cannot see a thing! For all I know someone jumped my wall and stood still in the shadows until I stopped looking out my window. These lights have changed that! Now when I look outside I can see everything and would definitely put anyone off jumping over my wall because they will be seen. The charge lasts all night. They turn on/off automatically when it’s night or day. When they arrived and I saw how small they were I was expecting poor lighting but on a full charge they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Enks

customer_reviews.title: They lasted one night
customer_reviews.text: These lights lasted one night, the following night they came on for one hour then went off. I have them positioned on a fence post in a south facing garden. The days are short and the nights long at this time of year and these just don't have the staying power. I will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Pete's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: These lights are excellent value for money. They are small but provide loads of light when full charged. For the last week we have had almost no direct sunlight, yet they still came on at night. Admittedly only for a few hours but when they do get loads of sun they are on for hours, long past your bedtime! Very easy to fit with 2 screws in to wood and they provide rawlplugs if you want to fit a brick wall.
customer_reviews.author: Andy D

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap and plasticky
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use on the front of my house. Unfortunately they look far too cheap and plasticky. Light produced is bright, but it's a cool white and doesnt make then look the best. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick and efficent. Easy enough to install. Just remember to turn them on before putting the casings back on. They do a good job of lighting up the garden. Not as powerful as flood lighting but give a nice ambient glow. Not had them long enough to know if they will withstand all elements bur will update if any issues.
customer_reviews.author: James barrett

customer_reviews.title: I paid £16.99 for my first order! Now they are apparently 'reduced' to £27.99
customer_reviews.text: I'm annoyed to watch these continually go up in price over the last few weeks! They go up in price by about £1 everyday since the pandemic has started. Earlier this year for a box of 4 it was £16.99, then £19.99, and now they're advertised at £27.99!! CRAZY. They are good lights and worth £16.99/19.99 but DEFINETELY not worth £27.99. Its a shame as the price increase is crazy and in my opinion unjustifiable !!!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: We have installed them at the worst place in the garden to see how they do with little light to recharge during the day and they still light up (feebly) at night. Will probably buy more as they are cheap, we have a very long garden and they are a better option than our usual pitch dark anyway. Screws are poor quality, we used our own.
customer_reviews.author: B. Amandine

customer_reviews.title: Much better products out there
customer_reviews.text: These are really really basic, 5 LEDs and AA rechargeable battery. They solar did not pick up enough power in the location I need them and so after a few hours they would go dim and switch off. I've since replaced these with ones from LITOM. The difference is night and day 'pun intended' and only for a fiver more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Needs plenty of sunlight UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but a little flimsy. Relies on plenty of sunshine to last to midnight. So that means summer because on a typical UK winter day the light fades quite quickly after about 3 hours to nothing. TWO OF THE UNITS HAVE NOW FAILED BUT THE OTHERS ARE IF ANYTHING WORKING BETTER THAN EVER (but that’s maybe because we’ve had more sun).
customer_reviews.author: christopher womack

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Installed these a couple of months ago to our caravan decking. Very easy to install and all are working well. Dusk sensor which means they only switch on in the evenings. Bought a second set- one out of the eight seem to be letting in water- but still a decent purchase. Updated- within 6 months 3 of the 8 lights have stopped working- disappointing
customer_reviews.author: john donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but short lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: These look quite smart and are surprisingly bright for their size. However, one failed in a few short weeks. Because these are sold as a pack of four, all of them have to be returned to get a refund. This is pretty inconvenient and it would be much more customer friendly to simply return the faulty one.
customer_reviews.author: Neil H.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Piece of Kit
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical at first so I only bought one set of 4 but what I got out of it was exactly what I needed. I then tried to buy another pack for the other side but it was sold out. The lights keep burning for several hours , in fact I can confirm they were still on around 2am one morning when I looked outside as I headed to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Florence

customer_reviews.title: OK - But At This Time Of Year Struggling To Get Enough Light It Seems
customer_reviews.text: I have to say currently that the lights are somewhat of a disappointment. Appreciating at this time of year the available light will have an impact on the their ability to charge, but if they come on by 18.00 they are off again by about 23.30. This is In comparison to far cheaper lights (four cost equivalent of one of these) being used previously and which offered far better longevity of light. I still have these but moved to different part of garden. Overall reserving judgement until longer daylight hours come along, but have to say for the money these are not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have bought many solar lights, but these are definitely the best. Although on the day they were put in the garden it was very cloudy, they gave such a great light in the evening. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Was initially pleased although was quite fiddly to get to the on switches....worked for one day/night...went out the 2nd night expecting to see a lit up garden ....nothing but disappointment. I would show you a photograph but you can't see anything at 11.49 pm!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Dyer-Maden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install although i damaged the top of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install although i damaged the top of the first slightly trying to remove protective film that wasnt actually there (as per instructions)! Lights up, although more ambient than bright enough to shine and see exactly what's going on. Quality seems 'ok' but works. Only been installed 2 days so will edit review if they fail
customer_reviews.author: Mr M

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant anymore
customer_reviews.text: First pack I purchased over 2 years ago still going strong with new batteries. However the pack Iv purchased in March 2019 have now ALL failed in under a year. Apparently a lot less water resistant than the original set which leads me to believe a change in the manufacturing process? Clarification from seller would Helo?
customer_reviews.author: Jackelline Pitman

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Very happy when they were originally installed, but after 10 months , the first light has failed! The battery has charged okay, but the light does not come on. Would be great if I could get a replacement light insert, but that’s highly unlikely now. Will have to change the other three light units that are working okay and buy another set of four so they match! Update. Following my review I was contacted by the supplier who subsequently arranged to send me replacement lights. Originals replaced and working well. Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Mowtown Records

customer_reviews.title: A nice effect.
customer_reviews.text: I actually clicked on 'Buy now' by mistake! But that was a happy accident because these solar lights are tremendous. It's not a 'flat' light but rather more of a 'textured' light - a bit like the effect of medieval glass, if you get my meaning. And that adds another layer to these lights. Yes, I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael Fields

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in the garden
customer_reviews.text: I have put these at various places in my garden and they do give out quite a bit of light. I have noticed though after a year that the length they stay on decreases probably due to the batteries. Replacing them should solve the problem. But overall they do give sufficient light for the size of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great, recently painted fence panels and wanted a few decorative lights to go on the new fences, looked at these and saw the reviews, was about hesitant re price but decided to give them a go, and wow these lights are great, all come together at the same time at dusk, easy to set up, easy to install. Would recommend and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: Very good lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great and really add a decent bit of light to my fence posts. Easy to install, just screw them on where you want them. I do wipe the tops occasionally but during the summer, they were very bright and stayed on for hours. Will get some more soon.
customer_reviews.author: The Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Better than your average outside lights
customer_reviews.text: I have only just bought these and due to the bad weather have not had a chance to try them in my garden. The quality looks good and also the price. An update on this product june18 .As we have had some good weather lately I decided to put these up in the garden sadly 2 out of the 4 I bought do not work . but the ones that do work are quite good. not sure whether to buy some more ?
customer_reviews.author: Happybeaver

customer_reviews.title: Great lights look very effective
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights have them on my fence really light up my garden and patio area but not too much brightness my neighbour has already commented on them need another 4 jus t finish off very easy to put up. Was told to expect end of April but came within a couple of days after ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Bidz1234

customer_reviews.title: Can not fault this product
customer_reviews.text: These lights are the best I have ever bought, this is the second order I have made for them, the first lot of lights I have had up for 1 year and they illuminate every night non fail, even if the sun has not been out they still come on. They stay on for between 6 to 8 hours. I would definitely recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Perry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are FAB! Ive tried so many different ones which I werent happy with but these are just Perfect. Really light up the plants well undrneath the light. Not too bright to become annoying. Wish I had found these earlier. All I can say is if your looking for solar garden lights you wont be disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: HOODY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, give bright light
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 packs of 4 units to fit on posts around garden fence. Made up tube spacers to give them clearance from the post and shrubbery for maximum illumination. The batteries came already charged and after a day's further charging they stayed on from dusk until the last check at 0400. Greased the battery terminals so hopefully once the existing rechargeable batteries' life has expired, the units will still be good for battery replacement and further usage.
customer_reviews.author: George Vella

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far this looks great. I have a video I would like to share. The light is good but wont go straight to the ground which is about 5.8ft from the ground. Looks great at night though
customer_reviews.author: Eoin

customer_reviews.title: Was hopeful
customer_reviews.text: Small yet very powerful. At first was a little underwhelmed by the size of each light - they are on the small side. Let's not be sizeist though - what they are a tad lacking in size they make up in quality - the light output is great and appear to keep going all night !! Update just after 1 month in one of the lights has stopped working
customer_reviews.author: david h

customer_reviews.title: Good lights though a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set of lights. Easy enough to install but be careful not to damage the working when screwing them in position. A bit pricey considering what they are... can't comment yet on longevity but the lights are working fine after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Madden

customer_reviews.title: Would be excellent if they worked!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First Night - Worked Great Second Night - Dimmed after an hour Third Night - 2 did not work at all and two were very dim Fourth Night - None of them worked The instruction advisd to remove the film from the solar panel - I cant see any sign of a film and have scratched the top trying to peel what wasnt there to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Emal

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume that these were easy to install as I never heard one swear word from my husband There has been quite a lot of rain since the lights were fitted and there have been no issues at all, I was concerned about how weatherproof they were after reading one of the reviews, but mine are great. At the moment the lights are coming on around 21.15 - 21.30 and they light up the patio. Overall I am very pleased with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: alison fudge

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lights.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but doesn’t detract from their performance, I love these lights, I have them on my summerhouse and even though they are not in direct sunlight all day they still come on at dusk and stay on all night, and are quite bright, also very fast delivery and well packaged. Well impressed with lights and supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Michael Manuel

customer_reviews.title: topelek solar garden lights
customer_reviews.text: these lights are brill bright long lasting and sturdy easy to install would defo recommend these lights are about a year old now they are still as good as they were on the first day of you want solor light for garden well you can not go wrong with these they are indestructable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack of 4 last year to along my fence. A year on they still work and looks great. I had to remove other solar lights from the garden I bought at the same time as they no longer work. I replaced them with more of the same light. You can get cheaper ones in the shop, but at least these one last more than a season.
customer_reviews.author: Marlenejvv

customer_reviews.title: SELLER SERVICE, DISPATCH & PRODUCT VERY EFFICIENT.
customer_reviews.text: Attached to fencing. Worked very well. 3 of the 4 lights still working but one has gone out. Buying another 2 sets for further fencing being built. Recommend these as they are simple to put up and look neat, bright lights. Recommend product, seller and service. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cazziola

customer_reviews.title: Change product headline - confusing . . .
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than you think but otherwise ok. Product description needs to be changed as I misread it and assumed the quote "6 LED" meant 6 lights, it refers to the amount of bulbs not actual lights Following the above I received excellent customer service and am happy to upgrade to 4 stars. Still feel the product description needs changing, I'd give it 5 stars then
customer_reviews.author: Neil Harding

customer_reviews.title: Fit Fir Purpose
customer_reviews.text: They arrived very quickly, especially in these times. I already had some of these lights for the garden, so I just wanted some additional. They are very bright, for the size, and my garden is small so they do the job, they do require a good bright day to fully do there job, in the evening. Otherwise very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mc Callan

customer_reviews.title: Pleased and impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not really given them a full test yet - but they look good well, designed and neat and tidy. They need at least a month in English weather to give a decent assessment ...so we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hobby

customer_reviews.title: Can only assume these have a poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 packs of 4 and installed them a week ok. First night they looked great, but then on the second night one didn’t come on. Opened it up pressed the button off and on, and then it came on but went off after around 15mins! Despite the sunshine we’ve been having, 3 out of the total of 8 are now like this! This is really disappointing because when they are working they look great and would have ordered more....but it seems clear that these have a quality control issue or their components are unfortunately flawed.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Second time buyer
customer_reviews.text: These lights are about as good as you are going to get for the size, No they won't last more then 3 to 5 hours in summer, some days in winter 10-30 mins but that is solar for you. Unlike other solar lights i have bought, they have lasted over 12 months and upon internal inspection will last a lot longer, hence bought a second lot and so far so good (not surprising). If unhappy test there 45 day money back or 28 month warranty, be sure I will if required.
customer_reviews.author: Barbican

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant n bright
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit expensive so I was reluctant to buy them n now I m glad that I did . They are very bright especially for solar lights .thinking about buying som more but price is a bit issue so will wait.
customer_reviews.author: Sadi

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Not used them yet as i never leave my solar light outside over winter. Took one out when i got them and left it out for a day and night. They do look as if they are going to be quite bright.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Den

customer_reviews.title: Happy garden.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are brilliant, in every way, I have them on 7 fences, and have sent for some for my shed, the lights is great ,and last for quite a while, I hope they continue this way. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: florence

customer_reviews.title: Do a great job for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and fitted them yesterday. Impressed with the amount of light for such a small unit- photo attached. I’ve now ordered some for my Son! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Value for money?
customer_reviews.text: Like them...when they work. 2 out of the 4 now cease to work. So I can therefore only give this product 2 stars. Currently have two black boxes on my fence post, that sjhould be bright. As I bought two sets; I now have issue as to whether I purchase another set, when I only need 2...and question why I have to spend again so soon after purchasing. Surely that is barmy; when I must question the quality and longevity of the product in the first instance.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Fitted these in about 10 minutes - first one a bit fiddly only till you see how it looks best. Give a great light. Over the moon with them. Bought two sets for new strps in garden and will be buying another 2 sets for some more areas. I don't expect to get a full battery charge on a dull day. Really cant understand the mentality of some reviews - should take a basic common sense course!
customer_reviews.author: ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Add safety to your outside space.
customer_reviews.text: These lights look really nice on the fence outside. Not too glaring but enough to see your way safely to the door. The solar power system allows the lights to work late into the night.
customer_reviews.author: Me, myself & I

customer_reviews.title: Solar-Powered Lights
customer_reviews.text: I installed them in a metal lantern on the driveway. They're not motion-sensored but they use solar power gathered during the day to shine at night. They're just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of solar lights.
customer_reviews.text: Got to say that bought three sets of these already and really pleased with them. Give a nice bright glow to our front garden for a few hours after a full charge. Yet to see what happens in winter. I found the installation relatively easy & effortless. The finishing result at night is simply stunning. Can't wait for relaxing summer nights in the garden. Will surely purchase again..
customer_reviews.author: Georges Guerreiro

customer_reviews.title: Super bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Loved these lights so much I ordered another set so I can put all around my garden on my fence panels. They give off lots of light considering they are solar. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Looked good, arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Product came as promised. Easy to follow instructions. As its winter and the weather is poor we charged 2 from an indoor window ledge. The cold white light is decent and lasts about 6 hours, even in this poor daytime charging. I'm looking forward to getting them set up in the garden
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Use a charger 1st on batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking little light. But nothing said about charging batteries first to get full potential or information about pressing the the little button in I had to find this out myself on YouTube. I really like them just wished I knew a bit more
customer_reviews.author: leah baker

customer_reviews.title: Best Solar Fence Lights Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in Sept 2018, I screwed them on to out garden fence myself it was so easy. I am amazed how much light they give off compared with other brands I've tried over the years. I dont usually write reviews but these lights have come on once it gets dark and will stay on all through the night until the sun comes up again which im amazed at. The other brands that I've tried would only last 3 hrs max and the luminosity would be very low and poor. I happily give these fence lights 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them, great ambient lights.
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Not the most powerful light but neither are any others. They work great, look great and create a nice ambiance. They're lasting about 3 hours at the moment but it's April, come the summer I expect them to last longer with the extended daylight. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brykasema

customer_reviews.title: Bright great quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought similar lights before but these are 100 times better than my cheap Homebase ones. Brighter better quality and solid. Easy to install and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decorative lights
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lights. They do need to be placed in full sun to be fully charged, so they’re not so bright on dull days, but very nice decorative lights and good value.
customer_reviews.author: R5er97

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant lights
customer_reviews.text: The pictures do not give these lights enough credit. They are brilliant. They have only been in the sun for a couple of hours before I put them up and I am so impressed. I had purchased a set the week before and loved them so much I ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Angela_M

customer_reviews.title: Four bright little lights.
customer_reviews.text: All four on the wall leave enough light for me to see where I’m going on an evening at the side of the house. Charge up well with solar power and not bad for a fiver each I suppose. Better than all the messing about of electrical wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheaply made and disappointing purchase. Arrived damaged. Poorly packaged. Had to glue solar panels back on two of them. Two have stopped working. The quality is very poor. Bought a similar product at the same time which are substantially better . After sales has been good but I’ve lost confidence in the product and I really would like my money back to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good little lights
customer_reviews.text: They are good but will need a charge when u first get them and being solar charged they need to be in the light ofc. They are ok but don’t be expecting anything super bright
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Look fab in the garden
customer_reviews.text: These are very small lights but they do the job and look great. My parents bought some after seeing ours installed. Little bit fiddly to install but all in all would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good bright light output, can work most of the night (depending on sunlight). Take them down during winter months as winter weather will kill them.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and compact and easy to secure (I screwed them ...
customer_reviews.text: Lights turned up as expected. They are nice and compact and easy to secure (I screwed them into some fence posts in the garden. Taking the front case off was a little tricky at first, Hyatt use a very small screwdriver and gently prize open. Easy to activate the lights by simply pressing the button inside. Perfect for illumating the garden without dazzling yourself or neighbours.
customer_reviews.author: Espionage Writer

customer_reviews.title: 6 Led solar lights
customer_reviews.text: After opening them to switch on I noticed they are using good quality components , very pleased with it . May add larger battery for longer run time as I do with my Solar lights , i've put energiser nickel metal hydride batteries in before 2300mah probably well over the top .......
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Working out at £4 each, they are excellent value for money and provide an amazing amount of light. I have the fixed to the fence across the back of my garden and they produce an fanned arc of light that reaches the grass. They look professional when lit which i did not expect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, if you also invest in better quality batteries
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong and all 12 I bought charging after two years, they will stay on most of the night if they have had a full sunny day before, otherwise only a few hours, but I strongly recommend you replace the included cheap batteries that come with them with standard enloop rechargeables (as they have more recharge cycles than the enloop pros) to achieve the above results and for a longer period.
customer_reviews.author: Alison H.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lights
customer_reviews.text: They look lovely and were easy to put up. Not too big and look smart. Makes the garden look cosy during this lockdown period. Pleased wounding recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chloe HB

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is amazing
customer_reviews.text: These solar lights are the best I have ever bought. I initially bought 4 for my back garden but they were so good, I bought another 4 for the front garden. They are easy to put up and the brightness is amazing, they light up the whole garden. Fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Moraitou

customer_reviews.title: Night Light
customer_reviews.text: I have over the years bought many solar lights, I liked the look of these and the idea of fixing them to the fence, they are a smart, neat little light and when lit give off a really bright white light, I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: one or two don't come on for very long despite good sunlight in my back garden all day
customer_reviews.text: bought two sets, one never worked at all, not confident how long they will last. one or two don't come on for very long despite good sunlight in my back garden all day. wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: JSN

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I wasn't expecting much but I am impressed. Very easy to install. I have them on my patio attached to sleepers and on my back fence and they let off a lovely light. Have bought 2 packs already and will be getting a third. I did buy an extra pack of rechargeable batteries as the only comments peoples made on here that were not as positive was about the battery life. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: ellis and evie

customer_reviews.title: Good lights
customer_reviews.text: Good lights. Seems as though you need a few to get an area lit up enough. However, they are fairly bright considering its solar. They look good and are extremely easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: O Williams

customer_reviews.title: Garden lighting
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fit despite no instructions supplied. These are decorative lights so don’t expect them to light up your whole garden, I found them ideal for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these little lights brought 2 packs (8) put them at the top and in the middle of each fence panel down sides of garden, they gave a lovely little ambiance of an evening, better than fairy lights and they don't look chavy like some lights do, would highly recommend these, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: ... thinking about buying theses lights don't they are no good some times they work and sometimes don't work when ...
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is thinking about buying theses lights don't they are no good some times they work and sometimes don't work when it rains they don't work at all I got in touch with the seller and they would not help me all they tell you that the battery need charging I put new batteries in and they still keep going wrong so be careful what you buy ?
customer_reviews.author: steven  robert smith

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: One's that lightball day stay on all night. Others stay on for at least 4 hours. Overcast days produce less light so do not charge as well. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K.

customer_reviews.title: Look great and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. I have put them on separate fence panels and they look good and give off good light at night. I will buy more for the fence panels at the other side of the garden when they come back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fence lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are excellent value for money. A lot brighter than I expected and have ordered another four, which should arrive today. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ahug1945

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never really been fond of solar lights but after reading the reviews I thought I’d try these, they are amazing. Easy to fix and give off a bright light. The price for the pack of 4 is money well spent, you won’t be disappointed. Images are never going to give a true picture but I’ve attached one in an attempt to show how bright they are.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Garthwaite

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works better than it costs
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for more than 3 months now. When charged in direct sunlight, it looks great, gives sort of a rainbow flare effect and stays bright for at least 4-5hours. It’s relatively straightforward to install, and costs are reasonable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CDean

customer_reviews.title: Good light s.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fix on my fences. Great lights, just had a garden makeover and these cast a lovely light over my pride and joy of a garden. I put two in a more shady spot and realised my mistake when the lights didn't shine as well as other two at night. Anyway moved them now and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bigjannie

customer_reviews.title: Expectations were low, results were incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Can't quite say how impressed I am with these, didn't expect much given the price but they were easy to install and they look incredible. I took some pictures but they don't do the lights justice. They have illuminated my path and back garden, and I think i'll consider buying more for other areas too. Genuinely surprised at the quality of them! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Evo

customer_reviews.title: Price reflects in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: They look great in picture but do lack quality workmanship. I guess for the price, you can’t complain. There is no rubber seal around the clear plastic lens, I’m not sure if this is waterproof. Very light in weight also a lot smaller then shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sham Afzal

product_meta.title: Night Light Projector Ocean Wave Projector Star Projector Night Light Projector with Bluetooth Music Speaker for Baby Kids Bedroom/Game Rooms/Home Theatre/Night Light Ambiance byHEI Liang Sky

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,335 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
